definition: to exhibit as broadcast/to show (on TV)
surname Zhan
to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition
to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]

sentences.english: The film festival will include film screening screenings, art exhibilitions exhibitions and talks.
sentences.chinese: 將包括電影展播，藝術展覽和交流會。

sentences.english: MUSIC BOX shows the best of China's MTV products.
sentences.chinese: 《音樂電視》展播中國製作的音樂電視精品。

sentences.english: The interesting film was on TV last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚那場有趣的電影在電視中展播。

sentences.english: The German film and TV programs also attracted many visitors.
sentences.chinese: 隨後進行的德國影視節目展播吸引了大批來賓觀摩。
